Author: Tischel, Caitlyn
Name: Inventory Search Bar
Description:
Supports different types of filters to be able to find items by name, type, supported job or level requirements.

Supported Inventories:
	- Character Inventory
	- Chocobo Saddlebags
	- Retainer Inventory
	- Armoury
Punchline: Adds a search bar directly in the inventory window to filter items.
Changelog:
# 1.9.1.0

- Update dependencies (fixes retainer search and other issues)
